title: Friedrich Merz - Wikipedia
snippet: Prior to the second presidency of Donald Trump, he was frequently described as being "exceptionally pro-American", and was once the chairman of the Atlantik-Brücke association which promotes German-American friendship and Atlanticism. Joachim-Friedrich Martin Josef Merz was born on 11 November ...

title: Friedrich Merz puts Germany in an unfamiliar position: Out front – POLITICO
snippet: Friedrich Merz’s predecessors, Olaf Scholz and Angela Merkel, were reluctant to put the country in such an outspoken lead role internationally or within the EU.

title: Disinfo: Friedrich Merz is a descendant of Nazis
snippet: Friedrich Merz is a descendant of Nazis; his grandfather, Josef Paul Souvigny, while mayor of Brilon during the Third Reich, named streets after Hitler and Goebbels. He was a member of the Nazi Party and a member of the SS.

title: A ‘cog’ in the Nazi engine: Why the story of chancellor Friedrich Merz’s grandfather matters
snippet: A century ago, one of the most prosperous men in town – with a patrician mansion that still stands off the main square – was Josef Paul Sauvigny. He was the maternal grandfather of Friedrich Merz, who grew up in the house with his family ...
